name: Faulty Flap
description:
Faulty Flap puts you in control of a chubby 8-bit looking red bird. Tame the one-touch controls and fly your way through famously dangerous pipes. It won't be easy so don't harm your device.

- 8-bit retro graphics and sounds
- Flap, crash, repeat
- Don't harm your device

ARE YOU CREATIVE?
If you are, then learn how to create this game. Check out our free software, follow our step-by-step tutorial and build this game in less than three hours!
Would you like to know more?

Visit: http://www.clickteam.com/creation_materials/tutorials/faultyflap/en/

Grab your copy of Fusion to begin!
